author: andschwa
body:
```
Should have the correct HOSTNAME 81ms    Expected   paul ubuntu dev2     But was         at line  32 in  home paul monad linux src pester tests Test Environment Variables.Tests.ps1    32          $ENV HOSTNAME   Should Be $expected       Should return true if used on components other than filesystem objects 24ms    Expected   True     But was    False     at line  112 in  home paul monad linux src pester tests Test Test Path.Tests.ps1    112          Test Path Env  HOSTNAME   Should Be $true   VSO create date - 10/15/2015 17:11:00     VSO closed date - 11/5/2015 11:54:00     
```
title: Fix hostname Pester test failures on Paul's box
